data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A search through the chemical literature showed that this law was the universal rule. It ____ one ____ to ____ your ____ with ____ data ____ you ____ collected, but ____ is ____ more ____ to ____ it ____ everyone else's; ____ is ____ Dalton ____. The acceptance of the atomic theory was rapid and almost unanimous.
data.partBlankContent: A search through the chemical literature showed that this law was the universal rule. It i_ one th___ to pr___ your the___ with n__ data th__ you ha__ collected, but i_ is mu__ more impre_____ to pr___ it wi__ everyone else's; th__ is wh__ Dalton d__. The acceptance of the atomic theory was rapid and almost unanimous.
data.answer: 对化学文献的查阅表明，这一规律是普遍规律。用你收集到的新数据来证明你的理论是一回事，但用其他人的数据来证明它则令人印象深刻得多;这就是道尔顿所做的。人们很快就接受了原子理论，而且几乎一致接受。
